6. © 2012 IBM Corporation 6 The Premier Event for Software and Systems Innovation QUIZ – Question 1 How long does it take to deploy a complex development environment infrastructure? 1 How long does it take to set-up and feed a multi-platform test environment ? 2 How long does it take to upgrade and move the whole development environment ? 3 Which part of my test resources are not currently used by a project ? 4 > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 20% < 10% < 5% Context As project manager, I need to have built a complete development environment: • Various target platforms and languages: z/OS – COBOL ; Linux – JEE • Various development tooling: RDz ; RAD ; RTC • Various contributor profiles: developer, analyst, tester

7. © 2012 IBM Corporation 7 The Premier Event for Software and Systems Innovation QUIZ – Question 2 How long does it take to deploy a complex development environment infrastructure? 1 How long does it take to set-up and feed a multi-platform test environment? 2 How long does it take to upgrade and move the whole development environment ? 3 Which part of my test resources are not currently used by a project ? 4 > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 20% < 10% < 5% Context As a delivery team, I need to certify my products: • 3 versions development in parrallel • Targeting System z, System p and x86 • For 2 levels of DB2 and CICS, and 3 OS levels

8. © 2012 IBM Corporation 8 The Premier Event for Software and Systems Innovation QUIZ – Question 3 How long does it take to deploy a complex development environment infrastructure? 1 How long does it take to set-up and feed a multi-platform test environment? 2 How long does it take to upgrade and move the whole development environment? 3 Which part of my test resources are not currently used by a project ? 4 > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 20% < 10% < 5% Context As a release manager, I need to address major changes for the next release: • An upgrade of RDz and RTC is required, • Part of the team is relocated to another site, and another one is outsourced.

9. © 2012 IBM Corporation 9 The Premier Event for Software and Systems Innovation QUIZ – Question 4 How long does it take to deploy a complex development environment infrastructure? 1 How long does it take to set-up and feed a multi-platform test environment? 2 How long does it take to upgrade and move the whole development environment? 3 Which part of my test resources are not currently used by a project? 4 > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 1 mth < 1 wk < 1 d > 20% < 10% < 5% Context As an IT resource manager, I need to control z/OS test environment allocations: • I have only 20 LPARs • 80 projects are currently running, targeting 2 versions / year • I need to handle new test environment requests, and for that I need to know who is using which resources, and for how long …

10. © 2012 IBM Corporation 10 The Premier Event for Software and Systems Innovation What is Cloud Computing? Characteristics Deployment models Service layers NIST* Definition "Cloud computing is a model for enabling ubiquitous, convenient, on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources (e.g., networks, servers, storage, applications and services) that can be rapidly provisioned and released with minimal management effort or service provider interaction." *NIST - National Institute of Standards and Technology (US govt agency) On demand self-service Broad network access Resource pooling Rapid elasticity Measured service Public cloud Private cloud Hybrid cloud Business Process as a Service Software as a Service Platform as a Service Infrastructure as a Service = Cost VIRTUALIZATION + STANDARDIZATION AUTOMATION + Agility

14. © 2012 IBM Corporation 14 The Premier Event for Software and Systems Innovation Rational Enterprise Cloud – Enterprise Desktop 'As an enterprise developer, I want to access my mainframe development environment from anywhere' § Image content – Rational Developer for zEnterprise – Rational Team Concert • Eclipse client & RDz Integration feature – NoMachine FreeNX server • Remote access to desktop § Instance configuration – Copper: RAM 4 GiB, Disk 60 GiB – Setup & personalization through wizard • Preconfigured connections to z/OS and RTC server Pre-Release available soon after Innovate from the IBM SmartCloud Enterprise catalog

15. © 2012 IBM Corporation 15 The Premier Event for Software and Systems Innovation Rational Enterprise Cloud – Enterprise System 'As an enterprise developer, I want to build & test mainframe applications in a frictionless environment' § Image content – Rational Development & Test – Rational Team Concert • z/OS Build Engine for running dependency builds – JZOS, DB2, WAS – CICS or IMS application services § Instance configuration – Silver: RAM 8 GiB, Disk 1060 GiB – Setup & personalization through wizard • Preconfigured connections to RD&T licence server and RTC server • Started services (RTC build engine, CICS, IMS,...) Part of the Rational Enterprise Cloud Solutions Beta program starting this Summer

17. © 2012 IBM Corporation 17 The Premier Event for Software and Systems Innovation Summary and Conclusion § Main Benefits for the Enterprise developers – Targets various cloud contexts : public, private, hybrid – Solution-oriented, integrated and optimized product packages – Flexible Enterprise test capabilities – Dedicated solutions for Day-1 productivity – Ease deployment, maintenance and upgrade of solutions – Ease development / operations interactions in Enterprise context through provisioning capabilities – Address various customer contexts by providing componentized and extensible topologies § So, where do I start? First, contact us. We can jumpstart your enterprise development & test teams to the Cloud. Adopt the Rational Enterprise Desktop image, based on the combined RDz and RTC clients. • Request access to the IBM SmartCloud through your Sales Representative Join the Rational Enterprise Solutions Beta program starting this Summer to test drive the capability and provide us with valuable feedback. See the Enterprise Cloud live! Come to the 'Walks in the clouds' booth at Innovate Expo Hall
